name: Pick a wish
description:
Another day of hard work!

Here, at Trevi fountain, it is customary to throw a coin and ask for a wish. Help tourists and locals in making their doubts fade away. You will find a better fate for their coins.

Controls: Arrows to move, X to interact. [Tip: Click in the window if keyboard is not responding.]

Credits:

Developed by Yasmina & Eduardo, original idea by Ceci.

Made with Godot and Gimp.

Post-jam update: Added a final animation, instead of a text message.
